title: SQL Formatter
subtitle: Format your SQL queries elegantly. Support for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle and SQL Server.
emptyPlaceholder: Insert a SQL query in the "Original SQL" tab
toastGeneric: Formatted as generic SQL. Some specific syntax may not be recognized.
seoTitle: Free Online SQL Formatter - Beautify Your SQL Code
seoDescription: The best free online SQL formatter and beautifier. Supports PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle (PL/SQL), and SQL Server (T-SQL). Make your SQL queries elegant and readable instantly.
whyFormatDescription: Clean, well-formatted SQL code is essential for maintainability and collaboration. Our tool helps you transform messy queries into readable scripts, making it easier to debug and optimize your database operations.
feature1Desc: Support for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle, SQL Server, and BigQuery.
feature2Desc: Transform keywords, functions, and identifiers to uppercase, lowercase, or preserve original casing.
feature3Desc: Automatically compact lists in parentheses for cleaner WHERE IN clauses.
feature4Desc: Adjust tab width, expression width, and logical operator placement to match your team's style guide.
howToUseStep1: 1. Paste your SQL query into the 'Original SQL' tab.
howToUseStep2: 2. Select your database dialect (e.g., PostgreSQL or MySQL).
howToUseStep3: 3. Customize the formatting options to your preference.
howToUseStep4: 4. Copy the beautified SQL from the 'Formatted SQL' tab.
postgresqlDesc: Standard compliant and robust open-source database dialect.
mysqlDesc: World's most popular open-source database syntax.
oracleDesc: Powerful PL/SQL formatting for enterprise applications.
sqlServerDesc: Comprehensive T-SQL support for Microsoft SQL Server.
bigqueryDesc: Modern Google Cloud BigQuery SQL syntax support.
privacyIntroContent: Welcome to SQL Formatter. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we handle your information when you use our SQL formatting tool.
privacyDataCollectionContent: We collect minimal information to provide and improve our service:
privacyDataCollectionItem1: Usage data through Google Analytics (page views, session duration, browser type)
privacyDataCollectionItem2: Language preferences stored in your browser's local storage
privacyDataCollectionItem3: Cookies for analytics and advertising purposes
privacyDataUseContent: The information we collect is used to:
privacyDataUseItem1: Improve user experience and application performance
privacyDataUseItem2: Understand how users interact with our tool
privacyDataUseItem3: Display relevant advertisements through Google AdSense
privacyDataProcessingContent: All SQL formatting happens entirely in your browser. Your SQL queries are never sent to our servers or any third-party services. We do not store, log, or have access to any SQL code you format using this tool.
privacyThirdPartyContent: We use the following third-party services:
privacyThirdPartyGA: Used for analytics to understand user behavior and improve our service. Google Analytics may collect cookies and usage data.
privacyThirdPartyAdsense: Used to display advertisements. Google AdSense may collect cookies and browsing data to show relevant ads.
privacyCookiesContent: We use cookies to store your language preference and for analytics/advertising purposes. You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect your experience.
privacyRightsItem1: Access the personal data we hold about you
privacyRightsItem4: Disable cookies through your browser settings
privacySecurityContent: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information. Since SQL processing happens in your browser, your queries remain private and secure on your device.
privacyChangesContent: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date.
privacyContactContent: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please visit our developer website at jfmaia.site.
termsIntroContent: By accessing or using SQL Formatter, you agree to be bound by these terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.
termsUsageContent: SQL Formatter is a free tool provided for educational and professional use. You may use it to format your SQL queries without restriction.
termsDisclaimerContent: The tool is provided 'as is'. We make no warranties regarding the accuracy or reliability of the formatting results. Use at your own risk.
contactSubtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you.
faq1Question: Is my SQL data sent to a server?
faq1Answer: No. All formatting happens locally in your browser. Your SQL queries never leave your machine.
faq2Answer: We support PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server, Oracle, and BigQuery.
faq3Question: Is this tool free to use?
faq3Answer: Yes, SQL Formatter is and will always be free to use for everyone.
sqlTip1Desc: Always use uppercase for keywords (SELECT, FROM, WHERE) to distinguish them from table and column names.
sqlTip2Desc: Use clear indentation (2 or 4 spaces) for nested queries and JOIN clauses to improve readability.
sqlTip3Desc: Use descriptive aliases for tables when joining multiple sources to avoid confusion.
detailedGuideTitle: The Ultimate Guide to SQL Formatting
detailedGuideIntro: Writing clean SQL is a superpower. It makes your code easier to read, debug, and maintain. This tool helps you achieve that instantly by applying industry-standard formatting rules to your raw queries.
